name: Yury Sidarenka
about: Enterprise Architect transforms business needs into adaptive, scalable architectures. Using deep knowledge of architecture frameworks and cloud solutions, collaboration with stakeholders to deliver strategic solutions that align technology with company objectives.
headline: Designing secure, scalable, cloud-native platforms.
intro: I specialize in Azure, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, and cloud security. This site is driven by simple JSON files—you can edit them in src/assets/ to update content without touching TypeScript.
highlights: Enterprise Architecture, Cloud Strategy, and DevSecOps leadership
Azure, AKS, Networking, Zero Trust, Observability
footer: Built with Angular & Tailwind. Hosted on Azure Storage Static Website.
